captions.text: You know how Ross followed Rachel on that plane? You need to find a girl that you would do that for.
I know but somebody's calling me from...
Oh my God. I can't even.
It's like so cold in here.
That's more your side then my side.
Come on! One of my sides is fucked up.
You keep saying that. No one knows what you mean.
Your balls look huge in this picture.
What kind of kale do you have?
Do you have a cold-press kale?
Oh! Let's send him a pic of us.
I just got your snapchat. This is the funniest thing I've ever seen in my life.
*singing* Won't take nothing from nobody. Yeah...
I wish I could sing like you.
Come on, Chris! Let's get turnt!
Oh my God! She's here. I told you she'd be here.
We did not come here for her. This is our night. This is boys' night.
Dance with me. I--She hasn't seen me. I don't think she's seen me yet.
Is she here with another guy?
Oh shit! There's Dave. He'll kill me if I don't say hi. Dave! Do not text Ashley! I will rip your balls off and steal'em for my own, ok?
...I'll never forget with the people I'll never remember.
*drunk laughter/talking incoherently*... with the people we'll never forget!
*singing* And we can't stop! And we won't stop! Woooo!
They're not even looking at us!
I'm just gonna text her really quick.
I'm gonna text her, "You're a liar." And then I'm not gonna text her.
Fine! I'm not gonna text her for the rest of the night.
Shh. What she did was wrong. *sobbing*
You are not that guy, ok? Ok, yeah we'll sit down.
*singing* And we can't stop. And we won't stop.
I don't like anyone else but you.
She's a boatload of problems if you ask me. Seriously though. She's a shipwreck. A pirate of love just anchoring you down.
The 2 minute 30 mark will bring you to tears. I gotta watch this for one second.
Ugh! These people here are so fake.

comments.text:
I don't see what's wrong with any of these things though? Like sure, it's 
silly, but who cares? Why is it considered "basic" when most girls don't 
act like this, and why does everyone make fun of it? Like do people get 
this sexist stereotyping is still sexist regardless of whether the women 
you're stereotyping are white or not? 
Note: I'm not saying this is racist. It's not. But it's still sexist, and I 
thought buzzfeed was above perpetuating negative stereotypes. Guess not 
though :/﻿
